question.title: AngularCookieLocaleResolver Class Missing in JHipster 8.11.0
question.body:
I upgraded JHipster from 7.x to 8.11.0. But somehow I cannot find the class tech.jhipster.config.locale.AngularCookieLocaleResolver to import. But I couldn't find another jar that contains it. And searches also did not give me anything concrete.

Currently getting compile error:

package tech.jhipster.config.locale does not exist

Could you please let me know if this class has been deleted/deprecated. And what to use from now on in its place?
